article_title: An Unwise And Unnecessary Internet Power Grab

article_metadata.author: Capital Flows

og.description: BY SENATOR ORRIN G. HATCH - The Obama administration’s proposal to regulate the Internet is an outdated answer to a largely imagined problem. The right approach to keeping the Internet free and open is to vigorously enforce our nation’s antitrust laws, and to pass targeted legislation as needed to guard against specific ills.
og.title: Net Neutrality: An Unwise And Unnecessary Internet Power Grab
